title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.4 - Special/discount fares
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.4 - Special/discount fares

State Regulations

The authorities may offer from time-to-time special fares
or special fare media for tour, experimental or promotional purposes, or to
offer discounts from its fares for such purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1003.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
